javadoc:
Interface implemented by objects that want to be notified when key events occur
 in the FieldPanel.

methods.name: keyPressed
methods.comment: Called the the FieldPanel receives a KeyEvent that it doesn't handle.

params.name: ev
params.comment: The KeyEvent generated when the user presses a key.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index of the layout the cursor was on when the key was pressed.

params.name: fieldNum
params.comment:
the field index of the field the cursor was on when the key was
 pressed.

params.name: row
params.comment: the row in the field the cursor was on when the key was pressed.

params.name: col
params.comment: the col in the field the cursor was on when the key was pressed.

params.name: field
params.comment:
current field the cursor was on when the
 key was pressed.

name: FieldInputListener
comment:
Interface implemented by objects that want to be notified when key events occur
 in the FieldPanel.
